channel.title: CVE Feed for WPvivid Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPvivid Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35664|2024-06-04T13:54:49.976Z -- wpvivid%20team -- wpvivid%20backup%20for%20mainwp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPvivid Team WPvivid Backup for MainWP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WPvivid Backup for MainWP: from n/a through 0.9.32.

item.title: CVE-2023-41243|2024-05-17T06:53:29.316Z -- wpvivid%20team -- wpvivid%20backup%20and%20migration
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in WPvivid Team WPvivid Backup and Migration allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WPvivid Backup and Migration: from n/a through 0.9.90.

item.title: CVE-2024-35664|2024-06-05T05:15:37.156Z -- wpvivid%20team -- wpvivid%20backup%20for%20mainwp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPvivid Team WPvivid Backup for MainWP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WPvivid Backup for MainWP: from n/a through 0.9.32.
